item.title: On College Students
item.description: As a school kid, I was always fascinated by meeting college students from top tier colleges. There was something surreal in the way they talked and they confidently stood with T-shirts proudly proclaiming the name of their alma mater. I used to have the impression that no matter what came …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija

item.title: What I've been upto
item.description: This semester has gone a little too fast for my liking. Though there were plenty of good memories and takeaways from this semester, it has been by far my most stressful time in this college yet. Between taking on a number of technical projects and trying to rescue a sharply …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija

item.title: What do I do now?
item.description:
I spend a lot of time thinking since I've joined college.

I had postponed a lot of introspection during the two years I spent slogging away for the JEE. But now, with ample free time and practically no requirement to go to classes, I've finally got some time to look …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija
